plot: In A.D. 2200, the Galaxy Garrison sends the expeditionary ship Rugger Guard to find new planets for future colonization. But when the Galveston Empire threatens the crew of the Rugger Guard with war, the 15 members of the Rugger Team sortie to form the mighty robot Dairugger XV to defend their ship and ensure the future of humanity.
opening_theme: "Ginga no Seishun" (銀河の青春; Galactic Youths) by Koichi Kawazu
ending_theme: "Ai wo Tsutaeru Tabi" (愛をつたえる旅; A Journey to Give Love) by Koichi Kawazu
insert_song: "Hoshizora ni Tameiki" (星空にためいき; Relive the Starry Sky) by Yoshiaki Haneda
"Kami ga Iru Hoshi" (神がいる星; Star with God) by Peekaboo
"Otoko no Lullaby" (男のララバイ; A Man's Lullaby) by Yoshiaki Haneda and The Chirps
"R-I-V-A-L" (ラ・イ・バ・ル) by Yoshiaki Haneda
"Sono Hi no Tame ni" (その日のために; For That Day) by Masatake Ōkura
"Watashi wa Uchū" (わたしは宇宙; I Am the Universe) by Kazuko Kawashima
